title: Crossword Puzzle Answers
html:
Crossword Puzzle Answers

Across

1. AS-LOPE.
4. BA(LANCE)D.
10. T(ON)IC.
11. ANCESTRAL (anag.).
12. M(ON)ARCH.
13. THIR(S)TY.
14. SMA (R-T ALE)CK.
17. B-RED.
19. B-UMP.
20. CRIME-AN WAR.
23. IN-TER(I)M.
25. LI(MITE)D.
27. FOR(TUNA)TE.
28. TO-PIC.
29. DESSERTS (rev.).
30. CORRAL (homophone).

Down

1. A(T TIM)ES (rev.).
2. LINEN (hidden).
3. PAC-K RATS (rev.).
5. A-SCOT.
6. AS-SAIL.
7. CORKS-CREW (ROCKS anag.).
8. DE(LAY)ED.
9. BACH-ELOR (ROLE rev.).
15. A-RMATURES.
16. CAME-LEER.
18. PAL-MET-TO.
19. BRIE-FED.
21. RADI(C)AL.
22. GROUSE (two meanings).
24. MEA(N)T.
26. TAPER (two meanings).
